text: ohu oba wenuwen aaharayak piliyela kalawita atham wita eya rasawath nowunath ohuwa agaya karanna.

lowa wishalathama buddha prathimawata mulgal thabima ada agamathi athin wallawaya - dambaegoda jinadasa wallawaya handapanagala waw ismaththe us giri shikharayak matha wishwa lanka budu padanama magin idikirimata yojitha lowa wishalathama buddha prathimawa sandaha mul gal thabime uthsawaya ada (18 da) pa.wa. 3.00 ta agramathya di.mu. jayarathna mahathage pradhanathwayen pawathwe.

glasiyar walata wishala skandhayak atha.ema nisa glasiyaraye pahala stharawalata danena pidanaya/balaya ihalaya.pidanaya wadiwana wita jalaye drawankaya adu we.ema agaya ayis wala ushnathwayata wada aduwu wita pahala stharaye ayis drawa jalaya bawata pathwe.thawaduratath jalaya drawa lesa pawathinne udin athi ayis stharaya thapapariwarakayak lesa kriyakarana nisaya.
epamanak nowa chinayata hambanthota waraya samanga idam akkara 15,000k pawara dima 2017 di sidu kirimata niyamithaya.
thawa thawa mewani aluth nirmana kirimata nawa adahas pahala wewa !!!
me athara labana 31 wanida pawathwimata salasum kara athi krikat nilawaranaya pilibada kisiwak sakachja nowu bawayi ohu kiya sitiye.
wiweki awasthawala di api potha patha kiyawuyemu.
